title: Drawing, "Schlesinger: Revolving Round Table", December 10, 1936
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp, lower right: 8525/F.S./SCHLESINGER, OLSSON/D./12/10/36, 12/11/36, 1, SL.; inscribed in graphite, lower center: ONE TABLE SOLID TEAK - 48" DIA. 21" HIGH/REVOLVING TOP/TOP WITH LINOLEUM OR RUBBER INLAY; dimensions, materials, instructions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for circular revolving table. Revolving top of table in linoleum or rubber inlay; table in solid teak. Four legs rounded at top to be affixed underneath top of table. Cross-stretcher beneath table.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Schlesinger: Revolving Round Table", December 10, 1936.
December 10, 1936. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-980.
